text: Inta napi muhminkalukku avarkalutaiya uyirkalaivita melanavaraka irukkinrar innum, avarutaiya manaiviyar avarkalutaiya taymarkalaka irukkinranar. (Oru muhminin cottai ataivatarku) marra muhminkalai vitavum, (tinukkaka natu turanta) muhajirkalai vitavum conta pantukkale cilaraivita cilar nerunkiya (pattiyataiyutaiya)varkalavarkal; itu tan allahvin vetattilullatu enralum, ninkal unkal nanparkalukku nanmai ceyya natinal (muraippati ceyyalam) itu vetattil elutappattullatakum
